title: Inquire About Bid Status
description: A vendor wants to know if their submitted bid for a contract is still under consideration.

tasks.description: Identify the vendor and the contract in question.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the vendor's bid for the specified contract.

tasks.description: Check the current status of the procurement process.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sees that the contract is still in the 'Under Review' stage.

tasks.description: Inform the vendor that a decision has not yet been made.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear status update.
